name: rotation
notes:
# Thoughts On Rotation

- A better way to multiply [link](https://www.wired.com/story/mathematicians-discover-the-perfect-way-to-multiply/)

- Zuckerberg never fails to [be a central point of failure](https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/10/opinion/facebook-zuckerberg.html)

- EOS Chat is another example for the [IM equivalent of a newsletter](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/eos-chat/id1434117290) and the failure to standardize messaging

- Cluster is a virtual hangout growing in popularity in Japan [link](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=mu.cluster.app&hl=en_US)
